site.title: World Public Assembly
site.description: Global platform for dialogue and cooperation
home.subtitle: Global Platform for Dialogue
home.description: A meeting place for leaders, experts and the public from around the world
about.title: About
about.description: Learn more about the World Public Assembly
about.mission_intro: The World Public Assembly is a modern, open platform for those who feel responsible for the future and want to be not just a witness, but a source of change.
about.mission_text: Promoting the formation of international partnership contours as a conscious unity of peoples based on principles of mutual responsibility for the future, respect for moral ideals and cultural values of each nation.
about.mission_call: Now we have a chance to lay the foundation for a world where respect and cooperation lead, not fear and rivalry.
about.mission_belief: We believe: A new world begins where unity is established, where differences are respected not feared, where values transcend disagreements, and cooperation is stronger than competition.
about.culture_desc: Preservation and development of humanity's cultural heritage
about.education_desc: Development of education and science for future generations
about.sport_desc: Sport as a tool for uniting peoples
about.youth_desc: Development of youth initiatives and leadership
program.title: Program
program.hero_desc: Discover the events and discussion platforms of the Assembly

partners.title: Partners
partners.no_general: General partners have not been added yet

partners.no_strategic: Strategic partners have not been added yet
partners.partnership_text: Partnership with the Assembly opens new opportunities for your organization. Contact us to discuss cooperation terms.
participants.title: For Participants
participants.hero_desc: Learn everything you need to know to participate in the Assembly
participants.registration_text: Anyone can register and gain access to Assembly events.
participants.benefit_2: Meeting with opinion leaders from different countries
participants.benefit_3: Access to official documents and materials
participants.faq_1_q: What is the cost of participation?
participants.faq_1_a: Participation in most events is free. A fee may be charged for some specialized events.
participants.faq_2_q: How do I find an event I'm interested in?
participants.faq_2_a: You can view the full program on the Program page and filter events by category and date.
participants.faq_3_q: Where can I download the mobile application?
participants.faq_3_a: The application is available on App Store and Google Play. Go to the Mobile Application page for download links.
partners_page.title: For Partners
partners_page.status_text: Partner status with the World Public Assembly is an honorary status for organizations that contribute to the development of the business and cultural program of the event.
partners_page.benefit_3: Access to effective tools for interacting with international audience
partners_page.benefit_6: Opportunity to host your own events
partners_page.special_desc: Partnership in specific areas or events
partners_page.interested_text: Contact us to discuss partnership packages and cooperation opportunities.
